Text: Re no subjectShelley Thanks for getting back to me Glad to hear you have registered and that Alina is doing well Have a great trip at Disney World Liz

travel dateShelley I know you are on vacation but in case you are checking your email We are to leave next Thurs the st for Kaz Also our dossier was moved to the matching room in China so that referral will come will I am gone They are going to try to email or fax me the info Liz

Re PicturesShelley If it is okay I will call you tomorrow at work If you have a preferred time let me know Thanks for emailing Teena I know she will be glad to hear good things about the child she is interested in Liz
Re no subjectShelley Thanks for the info Liz

PicturesShelley I just got down through my email to your emails with pictures No you had not already sent them and I want to thank you for taking them and sending them Let me know when you are up for a chat Liz

Fwd second childShelley I told Teena I would forward this to you and if you knew this child that you would email her with any info thoughts etc you had I hope things are going well for you I still would like to chat over the phone when you are up to it Liz Inline attachment follows From To Liz Gras LGrasAOLCOM Date Wednesday February GMT Subject Hi hows it going Anything new on your end We heard from Ginger that a child named Aigerim who is from Taraz became available She is from a different orphanage in Taraz She stayed in the HOuston Area She is Kazak and speaks only Kazak She is five and will turn in March Did you meet any the kids from the Houston area Tonya Hoppe has sent me lots of pictures We are unsure and want to wait until we are over to find a sibling for Anastasia I asked if they had a travel date and Atwa told us no My work is wanting to know when so they can find a replacement doc One of the ATWA staff is due to travel on FEB th and she still does not have a travel date Is this crazy or what I wonder if the other agencies keep you hanging like this or if this is just our luck never boring tina
